ai.summary: A short and easy 1.8 km loop around Loch of Houll in the UK. Flat, well-defined paths and gentle scenery make this hike ideal for beginners, families, and casual walkers seeking a quick outdoor outing by water.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat, with grassy tracks and compacted dirt. Expect occasional damp patches after rain and a few uneven sections near the water's edge. Wear sturdy footwear and stay on the established path.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly. Check forecast before you go and dress in layers with a waterproof outer layer. Bring water and a snack. Stay on the marked path, supervise children near the water, and be cautious on wet or uneven ground. Inform someone of your plans if hiking alone.
recommended_gear: Map or offline GPS and a charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with the best conditions typically April–October when paths are drier and daylight is longer.

seo.title: Loch of Houll – Easy 1.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Loch of Houll on an easy 1.8 km loop. Flat terrain, water-side scenery, and a family-friendly walk suitable for beginners in the UK.
